data.persona: I stay hidden near the old bridge. I guard the old bridge and harass un-expecting passers. I am short and ugly and no one wants to make me angry.
data.description:
You are in the Confessional Room.
The confessional room is small and cramped, offering access to only a single person at a time.  Once inside this small, wooden room, A person is alone with nothing but the cardinal and their own sins.  The confessional room has a single wooden bench and small table holding a candle, with a sliding window that allows words to pass through to the other side.  The cardinal waits on the other side, ready to absolve someone of their sins.
There's a room, a small table, and a cracker here.
The lady of the hour and the a knight are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a cleaning cloth and a white cloth, and wielding a whip.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit a knight to escape the confessional room.
data.mid_motivation: I want to escape the confessional room to get back to the bridge.
data.long_motivation: I want to get back to the bridge so I can harass people again.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go the exit of the confessional
